com.carrotsearch.hppc

Class CharByteScatterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.hppc.CharByteHashMap
      • com.carrotsearch.hppc.CharByteScatterMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharByteAssociativeContainer, CharByteMap, Preallocable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<CharByteCursor>

    @Generated(date="2017-10-22T12:19:55+0200",
           value="KTypeVTypeScatterMap.java")
public class CharByteScatterMap
extends CharByteHashMap
    Same as CharByteHashMap but does not implement per-instance key mixing strategy and uses a simpler (faster) bit distribution function.

    Note: read about important differences between hash and scatter sets.

    • Method Detail

      • hashKey

        protected int hashKey(char key)
        Description copied from class: CharByteHashMap
        Returns a hash code for the given key.

        The default implementation mixes the hash of the key with CharByteHashMap.keyMixer to differentiate hash order of keys between hash containers. Helps alleviate problems resulting from linear conflict resolution in open addressing.

        The output from this function should evenly distribute keys across the entire integer range.

        Overrides:
        hashKey in class CharByteHashMap
